services.title: Services
services.service_title1: Main services that I offer at home as a professional:
services.service_title2: Other services offered that are implicit in home care:
services.service1: Examine position and engagement of the baby
services.service4: Monitor intensity, duration and frequency of maternal contractions
services.service5: Perform electronic fetal monitoring to verify fetal well-being
services.service8: Education, counseling and advice regarding well-being during pregnancy, labor, delivery and postpartum, cesarean section wound, episiotomy (picket), breastfeeding, Newborn Care
services.service9: Examine mother in postpartum and quarantine

advices.title: Tips during Pregnancy
advices.title2: Belly hardness every 10 minutes or less
advices.text1: The following to show are signs and symptoms that you must take into account, in case any of them occur, in any week of your pregnancy, I recommend you go to the nearest medical center to be examined.
advices.text1_4: Sensation of desire to urinate very frequently
advices.text1_7: Pain in the ovaries, vulva, vagina or hips
advices.text2_2: Occasional hardness in the abdomen is normal
advices.text2_3: Very frequent hardness in the abdomen is alert
advices.text3_1: Leakage of blood like menstruation type or more
advices.text3_3: There is a risk of placenta previa, placental abruption, cervical bleeding, among others.
advices.text4_1: Leakage of fluid from the vagina
advices.text4_3: Once it happens, it continues to come out
advices.text4_4: Special attention if it is dark or bloody liquid
advices.text5_1: Feeling few or decreased fetal movements
advices.text5_2: You must move at least 10 times a day
advices.text5_3: Eating and lying down to perceive movements
advices.text6_1: More frequent in adolescents or elderly
advices.text6_3: Pain in the pit of the stomach

courses.title: Palmares Childbirth Preparation Course
courses.phrase: The professionalism of obstetricians is evident in their commitment to staying up-to-date with the latest medical advancements and techniques to ensure the safest and healthiest delivery possible
courses.phrase1: Obstetricians are not just medical professionals, but also confidants, counselors, and advocates for the health and well-being of both mother and child
courses.phrase2: Held in Palmares between April 15 and 22 at the College of Western Physicians
